#include <iostream>
#define lld unsigned long long int
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    lld a[25];
    a[1]=0;
    a[2]=1;
    lld i;
    for(i=3; i<=21; i++)
        a[i]=(i-1)*a[i-1] + (i-2)*a[i-2];

    lld t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        lld n,k;
        lld mod;
        cin>>k>>n;
        if(k<=9)
            mod=10;
        else if(k<=99)
            mod=100;
        else
            mod=1000;
        lld count=0,rem;
        //int count=0;
        lld cur=a[n];
        if(k==0 && n==1)
            cout<<"1\n";
        else
        {
            while(cur!=0)
            {
                rem=cur%mod;
                if(rem==k)
                    count++;
                cur=cur/10;
            }
            cout<<count<<endl;
        }

    }
    return 0;
}
